simple_tactics.probleme: Choosing the right tactics in a match

debutant.nom: Serving backspin to set up your own strengths
debutant.description: Serve backspin so you get a lot of push returns. If the receiver pushes at wide angles, serve backspin low to the middle.

debutant.nom: Serving varying sidespin and topspin serves
debutant.description: Serve varying sidespin and topspin serves, with varying speeds and depths. If you are quicker than an opponent, serve topspin so you can get right into a topspin rally.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice pushing returns after serving backspin. Vary the angle and speed of your pushes.
Practice serving varying sidespin and topspin serves, with varying speeds and depths. Focus on getting into a topspin rally if you are quicker than an opponent.

metriques_progression: Play your strengths against an opponent's weaknesses. Learn to play your medium shots to the opponent's weaknesses, or your strengths to the opponent's medium shots.
